headline: How Fake Invoices Duped BlackRock Unit Into a $400 Million Loan
summary: The wipeout of a loan by BlackRock’s HPS to a telecom entrepreneur points to risks for even the most sophisticated investors in the booming private-credit business.

content.title: How Fake Invoices Duped BlackRock Unit Into a $400 Million Loan
content.summary: The wipeout of a loan by BlackRock’s HPS to a telecom entrepreneur points to risks for even the most sophisticated investors in the booming private-credit business.

headline: Goldman Sachs’ Bitcoin holdings reveal 45% unrealized loss
summary: Goldman Sachs’ reported Bitcoin holdings have fallen by 45% since its last regulatory filing, a decline driven almost entirely by Bitcoin’s price drop. Based on fourth-quarter 2025 Form 13F disclosures, Goldman Sachs holds indirect exposure to approximately 13,741 Bitcoin through spot Bitcoin ...

headline: Goldman Sachs holds $1bn in Bitcoin ETFs despite price rout
summary: The investment bank disclosed over $1 billion in exposure to Bitcoin. Altcoin ETFs, including Ethereum and XRP, also on the firm’s balance sheet. CEO David Solomon to speak at the Trumps’ World Liberty Financial forum in Florida on February 18.

content.title: Goldman Sachs holds $1bn in Bitcoin ETFs despite price rout
content.summary: The investment bank disclosed over $1 billion in exposure to Bitcoin. Altcoin ETFs, including Ethereum and XRP, also on the firm’s balance sheet. CEO David Solomon to speak at the Trumps’ World Liberty Financial forum in Florida on February 18.

thumbnail.caption: Goldman Sachs is holding just over $1 billion worth of Bitcoin exchange-traded funds. Illustration: Andrés Tapia; Source: Shutterstock.

headline: Navigator Midstream Expands Into Natural Gas Infrastructure
summary: DALLAS, February 11, 2026--Navigator Energy Services ("Navigator"), a Dallas-based energy infrastructure provider, today announced the expansion of its existing midstream platform with a dedicated natural gas infrastructure focus. The strategic initiative will be led by James Yardley, who joins Navigator from TC Energy. Backed by Global Infrastructure Partners (GIP), a part of BlackRock, Navigator’s entrance into natural gas infrastructure is a natural extension of its leading franchise in liqui

headline: Uniswap Token Jumps Following BlackRock Investment as BUIDL Goes DeFi

headline: Uniswap price surges as BlackRock snaps up governance tokens
summary: Uniswap's UNI token surged on Wednesday as other tokens slumped. The price bump came after BlackRock said it was working with the decentralised exchange. BlackRock, the world's biggest asset manager, also said it had bought UNI.

content.title: Uniswap price surges as BlackRock snaps up governance tokens
content.summary: Uniswap's UNI token surged on Wednesday as other tokens slumped. The price bump came after BlackRock said it was working with the decentralised exchange. BlackRock, the world's biggest asset manager, also said it had bought UNI.

headline: BlackRock takes first DeFi step, lists BUIDL on Uniswap as UNI jumps 25%
summary: BlackRock will make shares of its $2.2 billion tokenized U.S. Treasury fund tradable on the decentralized exchange Uniswap.

content.title: BlackRock takes first DeFi step, lists BUIDL on Uniswap as UNI jumps 25%

headline: Sodali & Co Hires BlackRock Investment Stewardship AI and Data Lead
summary: NEW YORK, February 11, 2026--Sodali & Co, the leading global capital markets-centric stakeholder advisory firm, is pleased to announce that Brett Miller has joined the firm as Global Head of Data Analytics based in New York. Miller joins from BlackRock where he served as Head of Data Analytics for its Investment Stewardship team.

content.title: Sodali & Co Hires BlackRock Investment Stewardship AI and Data Lead
content.summary: NEW YORK, February 11, 2026--Sodali & Co, the leading global capital markets-centric stakeholder advisory firm, is pleased to announce that Brett Miller has joined the firm as Global Head of Data Analytics based in New York. Miller joins from BlackRock where he served as Head of Data Analytics for its Investment Stewardship team.
